import React from 'react' import './login.css' import '../node_modules/bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css' function Login() { console.log("hello") function validate_email(email) { var mailformat = /^[a-zA-Z0-9.!#$%&'*+/=?^_`{|}~-]+@[a-zA-Z0-9-]+(?:\.[a-zA-Z0-9-]+)*$/; if (email.match(mailformat)) { alert("Valid email address!"); return true; } else { alert("You have entered an invalid email address!"); return false; } } return ( <>

password between 7 to 16 characters which contain only characters, numeric digits and underscore and first character must be a letter.
